subtitleNullable: Always start working on the Project which you love the most for me It's ANIME
descriptionNullable:
🌟 Unlocking Insights into Anime Preferences with Data Analysis 🌟

Are you a fan of anime? 🎬 Dive into the world of user preferences with our latest data analysis project! 📊In our dataset, we explore user ratings for various anime titles, delving deep into:

What I did in Project:-

🔝 Identifying top-rated anime titles with the highest average ratings.
📈 Analyzing the distribution of ratings across all anime titles.
🎨 Determining the most popular genres among users and their distribution.
📺 Exploring the prevalence of different anime Categories (movies, TV series, OVA).
👥 Identifying Anime titles with the highest community engagement.
🔄 Investigating the relationship between episode count and average rating.
💖 Conducting a comparative analysis of user ratings across genres and types.


#DataAnalysis #AnimePreferences #Insights #RecommendationEngine #UserEngagement #Analytics #AnimeFans #DataScience
